data.message: Hello facebook please I want to have an official page for my drawings can I? or not? please answer :- D

replies.message: Hi, Lama! We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles aren't eligible for verification at this time. You can learn more in our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/100168986860974. -Kelsey

Facebook I want to know how I can go back into my Sis Italia Modern Tzniut account, after you have illegally blocked me from it!

I happened to disactivate my account momentarily last night and this morning I could not log in!
Instead I found a message saying I should convert my profile into a page!! And blocked my access to the account totally!
I've tried to convert the account but you don't send me the EMAILS as you promise!!! To allow me to confirm my account!!
This is totally outrageous and if you won't give me access asap, I will sue you for financial damages, for not allowing me to run my business profile and not allowing me to convert to a page, which by the way I have already!! But thanks to FB bugs I have never been able to publish it!

I want my account reactivated. This makes you look like a bunch of unprofessionals.

Allow me to reactivate my account, then I can covert the profile!
blocking people acces to the their own accounts, I'm sure it's an infringement of the law, iot's my data you're holding!
